hooks.command: ~/bin/slack-notify-channel.sh ai-coders "Claude Code requires your action in project [$(basename "$PWD")]"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if [ "$(id -u)" -eq 0 ]; then user_color="\033[1;33m"; else user_color="\033[1;37m"; fi; git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" \033[1;34m[$branch]\033[0m"; fi; fi; printf "\033[1;36m[$(date +%H:%M:%S)]\033[0m ${user_color}$(whoami)\033[0m@$(hostname -s) [\033[1;37m${current_dir}\033[0m]${git_info}"
